original_text: And Jephthah judged Israel six years. Then died Jephthah the Gileadite, and was buried in one of the cities of Gilead.
korean_text: 입다가 이스라엘의 사사가 된 지 육 년이라 길르앗 사람 입다가 죽으매 길르앗에 있는 그의 성읍에 장사되었더라

sentences.original_text: And Jephthah judged Israel six years

sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 길르앗 사람 입다는 죽었으며

sentences.original_text: and was buried in one of the cities of Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 길르앗 성읍 중 한 곳에 장사되었습니다
